As of September 11th, TON Strategy Co. (Nasdaq: $TONX) disclosed:

$TON tokens: 217,529,634
Fully diluted common shares outstanding: 62,486,673
Unencumbered cash: $67 million
Treasury Asset Value (TAV): $761,087,677

TAV per share: $12.18

We've initiated our $250M buyback program, repurchasing >250K shares at an average price of $8.32 (~30% below TAV), and begun staking $TON for recurring on-chain revenues!

The buyback program, launched Sept 8 with Cantor Fitzgerald & Co. as agent, allows flexible repurchases to enhance shareholder value. Buying below TAV underscores our commitment to our stockholders and our financial strength.

The initiation of staking marks a key evolution: By securing the TON network with our holdings, we earn additional $TON yields, creating sustainable income alongside treasury appreciation. This flywheel - accumulation, staking, and growing our $TON holdings - positions us to compound value per share over time.

Our Executive Chairman @manuelstotz said it best: “These buybacks and staking milestones demonstrate our conviction in both the durability of the Company’s balance sheet and the long-term opportunity we see ahead...together with buybacks below TAV per share, these steps reinforce our strategy of steadily compounding value per share.”
